data.title: 10 CLOSEST Hotels Near Silverhill Stable - Boda Kyrkby
data.meta_description: Hotels near Silverhill Stable in Boda Kyrkby. Compare hotels closest to Silverhill Stable with room rates, real reviews and great savings. Most hotels are fully refundable on Trip.com.
data.text:
Situated in Boda in the Dalarna Region, this traditional Swedish lodge dates back to the 15th century. Dränggårdens Stuga has wooden floors and views of the garden. Free private parking is available on site. Leksand is 37 km away while Dalhalla is as close as 10 km from the property, but very easily accessible via a shortcut. The kitchen is fully equipped with an oven, microwave and coffee maker. There is also a seating area with a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a shower. During warm weather, guests can enjoy the cosy garden which has outdoor furniture, a barbecue and a large lawn. In the surroundings, horses can be seen grazing. A lake is located 2,8 km from the property. You can engage in various activities, such as skiing and horse riding. Tällberg is 30 km from Dränggårdens Stuga, while Rättvik is 18 km away.

Show More

Located in Rattvik, Stiftsgården Rättvik is on the boardwalk/promenade, a 5-minute drive from Rattviksbacken Ski Slope and 11 minutes from Dalhalla. This beach hotel is 21.2 mi (34.1 km) from Bjursas Ski Center and 22.5 mi (36.2 km) from Church of Mora. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a sauna or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, an arcade/game room, and a television in a common area. You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Stiftsgården Rättvik, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 9:30 AM. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 50 guestrooms. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided.

Show More

With a stay at Hotell Rättvik, you'll be centrally located in Rattvik, within a 15-minute drive of Dalhalla and Rattviksbacken Ski Slope. This hotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Wasa Stone and 1 mi (1.6 km) from Hembygdsgård Gammelgård. Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access and ski storage. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). At Hotell Rättvik, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily. Featured amenities include luggage storage and an elevator. Planning an event in Rattvik? This hotel has facilities measuring 431 square feet (40 square meters), including conference space. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 28 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and electric kettles, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Show More

With a stay at Backlund Boende i Dalarna in Vikarbyn, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Dalhalla and Rattvik Church. This bed & breakfast is 3.9 mi (6.3 km) from Wasa Stone and 4 mi (6.5 km) from Rattvik Golf Club. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a rooftop terrace and a garden. Additional features at this bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless internet access, an arcade/game room, and a television in a common area. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 10 AM. Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 13 guestrooms featuring microwaves. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

Show More

Located in Rattvik, Lustigsgården Boutique Hotel is in the historical district, a 1-minute drive from Rattviksbacken Ski Slope and 5 minutes from Rattvik Church. This golf bed & breakfast is 2 mi (3.2 km) from Hembygdsgård Gammelgård and 2.1 mi (3.3 km) from Wasa Stone. Enjoy recreation amenities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace. Additional amenities at this bed & breakfast include complimentary wireless internet access and concierge services. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10 AM. Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and luggage storage. Planning an event in Rattvik? This bed & breakfast has 258 square feet (24 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite. Stay in one of 12 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Housekeeping is provided on request, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Show More

With a stay at Näsets Marcusgård in Furudal, you'll be 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from Furudals Bruks Golf Club and 21.3 mi (34.3 km) from Dalhalla. This upscale vacation home is 23.9 mi (38.5 km) from Rattviksbacken Ski Slope. Spend the day on the slopes, or enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features at this vacation home include complimentary wireless internet access, ski storage, and a picnic area. Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities. This vacation home has 3 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 4 individually decorated guestrooms. Rooms have private lanais. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided.

Show More

Located in Tallberg, Åkerblads Gästgiveri Hotell Spa is in the historical district, within a 15-minute drive of Leksand Sommarland and Siljansnäs Naturum. This upscale hotel is 13.7 mi (22.1 km) from Dalhalla and 6.6 mi (10.6 km) from Orsandbaden. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an outdoor pool, and an indoor pool. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, an arcade/game room, and ski storage. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the swim-up bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Guests may use a train station pick-up service for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Stay in one of 73 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have hair dryers and bathrobes. Conveniences include phones and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Show More
